item.title: 3-2-1 Agar Agar Cups
item.description: Materials Agar Agar Powder Corn Flakes, Potato Flakes Corn Syrup Food Coloring Quart/Pint Jar w/ Lid Scale that weighs in grams Stovetop, top burner grill Pressure Cooker How to? Weigh out 3 grams of potato flakes into quart jar. Weigh out 2 grams of Agar Agar Powder into same quart jar. Weigh out 1 gram of Corn Syrup into same court jar. Add 1/2 cup of water to the jar.
